name: PDFAnswerBot | Developed a chatbot application designed to intelligently search and extract documents using Flask, Python, Ollama, ChromaDB, Neo4j, Cypher, Streamlit, Llama-Index
description: Intelligent Querying: Implemented accurate question-answering based on the content of uploaded documents.
Persistent Storage: Stored document embeddings for quick and efficient retrieval.
Local Processing: Ensured privacy and security by processing documents locally without the need for internet access.
GraphDB: Enhanced querying by integrating a graph database (Neo4j) for better performance compared to vector databases

name: Mingle | Developed a social networking platform made in React, Express, Node.js, MongoDB, Cloudinary, Tailwind, Javascript
description: User Authentication: Secure login and sign-up using PassportJS and bcryptjs.
Messaging System: Real-time text messaging and image sharing with Cloudinary for media storage.
Group Management: Enabled group creation, global chat, and user connection functionality.
Account Management: Comprehensive settings for profile management and user interactions.

name: QuickStore | A cloud storage web application made in Javascript, Express.js, PostgreSQL, PrismaORM
description: User Authentication: Implemented secure sign-up and login functionality.
Cloud Storage: Supported file uploads with options for renaming and deleting folders.
File Management: Enabled users to download and delete files, view file details, and search through stored files.
Tech Stack: Built using Express.js, EJS templates with TailwindCSS for design, and PostgreSQL with PrismaORM for database management
